page.title: 14A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content:
A little further down the road is a family who have nine children. Their father is a farm helper and they live in a house with only two bedrooms, so all the children have to share one bedroom, but they do have a big television in the kitchen!
When my mother does the shopping my mother drives into Taunton to a big superstore, sometimes I help her. It is fun getting all the food and drink and everything else we need in one shop. We go down to our village shop on Sunday after church to get the weekend papers and some sweets! It a tiny shop but it does have lots of things, we buy ham and cheese and ice lollies there as well.
